# Building Contextual Data from Online Sources

## Motivation

  - How can I extend the utility of data I already have?
  - What else can I find out about the world?
  - Can I make nice looking things?
  
## Helpful packages
  
  | Package | What it does |
  |---------|--------------|
  | tidyverse | Data manipulation tools |
  | httr | Similar to cURL, command line web |
  | jsonlite | Parses JSON, converts to other data format |
  | ggmap | Easy maps, geocoding, and more with Google API! |
  | rvest | Web page scraping tools | 
  | tidycensus | Interacts Census API |


## File list

| File | Description |  
|---------|--------------|
| code_examples.R | All steps from presentation |
| /fun | Folder of functions |
| /out | Place to store output |
| /raw | Place to raw data |
| /presentation | PDF of presentation |
